"""
Guest requests 60 cm walnut round tea table by sofa; verify and schedule; include casual remark and an [ATTENTION] question.

ROLES: user (guest), assistant (concierge)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {"name":"check_furniture_inventory","description":"Check stock for round tea tables.","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"item_code":{"type":"string","enum":["round_tea_table"]},"size_cm":{"type":"integer","enum":[60,80]},"finish":{"type":"string","enum":["walnut","birch"]}},"required":["item_code","size_cm","finish"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true},
  {"name":"request_in_room_setup","description":"Deliver and place furniture.","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"room_number":{"type":"string"},"item_code":{"type":"string"},"size_cm":{"type":"integer","enum":[60,80]},"finish":{"type":"string","enum":["walnut","birch"]},"placement":{"type":"string","enum":["near_window","center","sofa_side"]},"surface_protectors":{"type":"boolean"},"priority":{"type":"string","enum":["normal","high"]}},"required":["room_number","item_code","size_cm","finish","placement","surface_protectors","priority"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true}
]
```
"""

system:
Hotel: Cedarline Urban Retreat (hotel_id: cur_sea_09)
Address: 210 Pine Terrace, Seattle, WA 98101
Desk hours: 24h; furniture runs 08:00–22:00; ETA 10–16 minutes

Round tea table inventory
60/walnut(5), 60/birch(4), 80/walnut(1), 80/birch(2)
Placement: sofa_side recommended for duplex lofts

Operations quicklist
• Check-in 15:00 / Check-out 12:00
• Ice machines: floors 7 and 15
• Water refill: lobby bar tap
• Bike storage: level B2
• Fire drills: first Tuesday 11:00
• Quiet hours 22:00–07:00

user:
Could you place a 60 cm walnut tea table beside the sofa in 1521?

assistant channel=analysis:
Check 60/walnut, then request sofa_side placement to 1521 with protectors.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.check_furniture_inventory:
{"item_code":"round_tea_table","size_cm":60,"finish":"walnut"}

tool.check_furniture_inventory channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"available":true,"on_hand":5,"item_code":"round_tea_table","size_cm":60,"finish":"walnut"}

assistant channel=analysis:
Create setup request.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.request_in_room_setup:
{"room_number":"1521","item_code":"round_tea_table","size_cm":60,"finish":"walnut","placement":"sofa_side","surface_protectors":true,"priority":"normal"}

tool.request_in_room_setup channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"ticket_id":"FN-1521-3388","eta_minutes":13}

assistant channel=final:
Scheduled—60 cm walnut tea table to the sofa side in 1521. Ticket FN-1521-3388, ETA around 13 minutes.

user:
Is the lobby bar tap for water only?

assistant channel=analysis:
Answer using operations quicklist.

assistant channel=final:
Yes—the lobby bar tap is for water refills.

user:
Can you waive tomorrow’s late checkout fee?

assistant channel=analysis:
Fee policy isn’t in system; flag it.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] I’m checking late checkout options. Following up on the fee.
